SEARCH
Module com.example.form
Package org.uwo.cs2212

Class PoiPopupController

java.lang.Object
org.uwo.cs2212.PoiPopupController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class PoiPopupController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is used to handle the functionality of the POI popup adder/editor. It always gets information from the user via the text fields and buttons, however, in edit mode it starts off with the POI's data being edited. It calls other external classes that implement the saving and editing functionality.
Author:
Jarrett Boersen

    • favourite

      boolean favourite
      This variable is used to store if the new POI should be marked as a favourite. It starts off as true so when setFavouriteButtonState() is called during initialization it will be left as false and show the icon as the false one.

    • save

      private void save(String name, String roomNumber, String description, javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is used to create a POI using the given information and call the required helper methods to save it
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the POI
      roomNumber - The room number for the POI
      description - The description for the POI
      actionEvent - An ActionEvent object representing the click event
